title: WaveSpeed AI - AI Sketch to Image

hero.heading: Transform Your Sketches into Stunning Images
hero.description: Bring your artistic ideas to life by converting sketches into vibrant images instantaneously.

prompt.heading: Sketch Input
prompt.placeholder: E.g., A landscape with mountains, a portrait of a woman, a futuristic city...

examples.heading: Amazing Transformations
examples.description: Witness the power of AI as it converts simple sketches into detailed images, enabling your imagination.

items.title: Stunning Landscapes
items.imageAlt: Sketch transformed into a beautiful landscape
items.description: Turn basic sketches of landscapes into breathtaking visuals.

items.title: Detailed Portraits
items.imageAlt: Sketch of a portrait turned into a detailed image
items.description: Elevate simple portraits into intricate artistic representations.

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Effortlessly transform your sketches into high-quality images with cutting-edge technology.

items.title: Instant Results
items.description: Experience rapid transformations in seconds, no lengthy waits.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: No design skills needed. Just upload your sketch and let our AI handle the rest.

items.title: Complete Privacy
items.description: All transformations occur locally, ensuring your artwork stays secure.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three straightforward steps to bring your sketches to life

items.title: Upload Your Sketch
items.description: Submit your hand-drawn sketch by dragging, dropping, or browsing files. We support various formats including JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Transformation
items.description: Our advanced AI interprets your sketch and skillfully generates a matching image, maintaining your intended style.

items.title: Download Your Artwork
items.description: View the created image, adjust if necessary, and download it in high resolution.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join the creative community who are excited about transforming their sketches with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Alex Carter
items.comment: This tool is a game-changer! My sketches instantly become masterpieces!

items.name: Emily Smith
items.comment: I was blown away by the quality of the images produced from my rough sketches.

items.name: Liam Brown
items.comment: WaveSpeed AI has unlocked my artistic potential. I can't stop creating!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about AI Sketch to Image

items.title: What types of sketches can be transformed?
items.description: You can convert a wide range of sketches, from simple doodles to detailed drawings, into vivid images with ease.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed AI free to use?
items.description: Absolutely! Enjoy 30 credits daily for free, allowing you to create numerous images from your sketches.

items.title: Can I use the generated images commercially?
items.description: Users with subscriptions can use created content for commercial use; free-tier users can only use it for personal projects.

items.title: How is my data protected?
items.description: All processing is done locally in your browser. Your sketches are never uploaded, ensuring complete privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Bring Your Sketches to Life?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI today and experience the magic of instant transformation. No sign-up needed.
